tag.description: thiendn1: override-Socket component is an agent that creates a channel between the server and the client.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: Desired protocol to be used valid values are websocket (default), sse, streaming, long-polling, jsonp.
attribute.name: transport

attribute.description: Fallback protocol to be used when desired transport is not supported in environment, valid values are websocket, sse, streaming, long-polling (default), jsonp.
attribute.name: fallbackTransport

attribute.description: Javascript event handler that is processed when the server publishes data.
attribute.name: onMessage

attribute.description: Javascript event handler that is processed when there is an error.
attribute.name: onError

attribute.description: Javascript event handler for atmospheres onClose callback.
attribute.name: onClose

attribute.description: Javascript event handler for atmospheres onOpen callback.
attribute.name: onOpen

attribute.description: Javascript event handler for atmospheres onReconnect callback.
attribute.name: onReconnect

attribute.description: Javascript event handler for atmospheres onMessagePublished callback.
attribute.name: onMessagePublished

attribute.description: Javascript event handler for atmospheres onTransportFailure callback.
attribute.name: onTransportFailure

attribute.description: Javascript event handler for atmospheres onLocalMessage callback.
attribute.name: onLocalMessage

attribute.description: Defines if client should connect to the channel on page load.
attribute.name: autoConnect
